name: UBX-ESF-INS
description: This message outputs information about the vehicle dynamics. The output dynamics information (angular rates and accelerations) are expressed with respect to the vehicle-frame.

bitfield_members.name: xAngRateValid
bitfield_members.description: Compensated x-axis angular rate data validity flag (0: not valid, 1: valid).

bitfield_members.name: yAngRateValid
bitfield_members.description: Compensated y-axis angular rate data validity flag (0: not valid, 1: valid).

bitfield_members.name: zAngRateValid
bitfield_members.description: Compensated z-axis angular rate data validity flag (0: not valid, 1: valid).

bitfield_members.name: xAccelValid
bitfield_members.description: Compensated x-axis acceleration data validity flag (0: not valid, 1: valid).

bitfield_members.name: yAccelValid
bitfield_members.description: Compensated y-axis acceleration data validity flag (0: not valid, 1: valid).

bitfield_members.name: zAccelValid
bitfield_members.description: Compensated z-axis acceleration data validity flag (0: not valid, 1: valid).

fields.name: reserved1
fields.description: Reserved bytes to match total payload length.
